name: In the Storm - Demo
description:
In the Storm is a short demo of a game created for the #ilujam2 (Romantic Boogaloo) in which a girl tries to tell her family something very important, but is interrupted by a crash and a strange glow.

Each play through takes no more than 10 to 15 minutes.

Credits:

Writing, Coding, & Visuals by WhatNames

Audio is from freesound.org by the following users:

ani_music, cabled_mess, club sound, Creeper_Ciller78, desdur, OneSoundToRuleThemAll, Phil25, RutgerMuller, Syna-Max, Therac-25, and cfork

Thank you for playing this demo! If you have any comments, questions, or feedback, don't hesitate to comment. Enjoy!
